abstract: New York Yankees trade left-hander Manny Banuelos to Atlanta Braves for right-handed pitcher David Carpenter and left-hander Chasen Shreve.
lead_paragraph: After years of waiting for the left-hander Manny Banuelos to fulfill his potential, the Yankees traded him to Atlanta for the right-handed pitcher David Carpenter and the left-hander Chasen Shreve.
snippet: After years of waiting for the left-hander Manny Banuelos to fulfill his potential, the Yankees traded him to Atlanta for the right-handed pitcher David Carpenter and the left-hander Chasen Shreve.

headline.main: Yankees Trade Former Top Prospect to Braves
headline.print_headline: Yankees Trade a Former Top Prospect to the Braves
